rationale: This species has a relatively wide distribution but also has widespread threats. It is currently assessed as Least Concern on account of its wide distribution and lack of information on any population decline at this time.
assessor: Lalèyè, P., Moelants, T. & Olaosebikan, B.D.
evaluator: Snoeks, J., Tweddle, D., Getahun, A., Lalèyè, P., Paugy, D., Zaiss, R., Fishar, M.R.A & Brooks, E.
